DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether combine group individual 12-Step facilitative ( TSF ) intervention , Stimulant Abuser Groups Engage 12 -Step ( STAGE-12 ) , improve substance -related outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol evaluate degree combine group individual 12-Step facilitative ( TSF ) intervention , Stimulant Abuser Groups Engage 12 -Step ( STAGE-12 ) , improve substance -related outcome compare treatment usual ( TAU ) without STAGE-12 among stimulant abuser . The primary objective evaluate reduction percent day stimulant use measure self-report . Secondary objective include evaluate reduction percent day use substance , degree STAGE-12 increase involvement 12-step activity attendance 12-step meeting , extent 12 -step involvement meeting attendance mediate substance use outcome .
